attributes.action: consider a change in law to allow Civil Partnerships to take place within the Christian Church.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gay Rights are Human Rights. We're not asking for marriage between two people of the same sex, we are asking the Prime Minister to consider proposing a new Bill that would allow the homosexual Christian community to get a Civil Partnership within the Anglican Church community; namely, the Church of England and the Church of Wales.
